title.rendered: SEABOURN UNVEILS NEW “SEABOURN JOURNEYS”, OFFERING PRE-, MID- AND POST-CRUISE EXTENSIONS FOR 2024 GRAND AFRICA VOYAGE

content.rendered:
The 2024 Grand Africa voyage journeys will feature premier wine experiences and incredible wildlife viewing opportunities in Africa’s most immersive and diverse destinations

SEATTLE, July 12, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Seabourn, the leader in ultra-luxury cruising and expedition travel, is introducing a selection of new pre-, mid- and post-cruise “Seabourn Journeys” available to guests on the 2024 Grand Africa Voyage. Seabourn Journeys provide in-depth, land-based cruise extensions that go beyond single-day excursions and offer guests a chance to linger and make new memories amid Africa’s extraordinary destinations.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/seabourn-unveils-new-seabourn-journeys-offering-pre–mid–and-post-cruise-extensions-for-2024-grand-africa-voyage-302195922.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
